languages.text: {n}Обсидиановая гладь огромной плиты начинает бурлить, на ней появляется набор загадочных символов, будто невидимый палец выдавливает их на черной поверхности. Три самых ярких {d|Encyclopedia:Ch5_NecronKnowlege}читаются как "Порча", "Мор" и "Расслоение"{/d}. Их мерцание выглядит тревожно, как жадные вдохи угасающего мученика.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Обсидиановая гладь огромной плиты начинает бурлить, пока на ней не появляется набор загадочных символов — будто бы невидимый палец выдавливает их один за другим на черной поверхности. Три самых ярких перед вами читаются как "Порча", "Мор" и "Расслоение". Их мерцание выглядит тревожно, как жадные вдохи угасающего мученика. Над ними выведена надпись.{/n}

languages.text: {n}The obsidian smoothness of the enormous slab begins to ripple and roil. A set of mysterious symbols appears on it, as if impressed on its black surface by an invisible finger. The three brightest ones are {d|Encyclopedia:Ch5_NecronKnowlege}symbols for "Malefice," "Pestilence," and "Unravelling."{/d} They shimmer forebodingly, like a martyr gasping for air as life drains from them.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Обсидиановая гладь огромной плиты начинает бурлить, на ней появляется набор загадочных символов, будто невидимый палец выдавливает их на черной поверхности. Три самых ярких {d|Encyclopedia:Ch5_NecronKnowlege}читаются как "Порча", "Мор" и "Расслоение"{/d}. Их мерцание выглядит тревожно, как жадные вдохи угасающего мученика.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The obsidian smoothness of the enormous slab begins to ripple and roil. A set of mysterious symbols appears on it, as if pressed into its black surface by an invisible finger. The three brightest ones are symbols for "Malefice," "Pestilence," and "Unravelling." They shimmer forebodingly, making you think of a martyr gasping for air as life drains from them.{/n}

{n}The obsidian smoothness of the enormous slab begins to ripple and roil. A set of mysterious symbols appears on it, as if impressed on its black surface by an invisible finger. The three brightest ones are {d|Encyclopedia:Ch5_NecronKnowlege}symbols for "Malefice," "Pestilence," and "Unravelling."{/d} They shimmer forebodingly, like a martyr gasping for air as life drains from them.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La lisa obsidiana de la inmensa losa empieza a distorsionarse. Una serie de símbolos misteriosos aparece en la superficie, como si los trazara un dedo invisible. Los tres más brillantes representan {d|Encyclopedia:Ch5_NecronKnowlege}«Maleficio», «Pestilencia» y «Anulación»{/d}. Emiten un brillo siniestro, como un mártir intentando coger aire mientras muere.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The obsidian smoothness of the enormous slab begins to ripple and roil. A set of mysterious symbols appears on it, as if impressed on its black surface by an invisible finger. The three brightest ones are {d|Encyclopedia:Ch5_NecronKnowlege}symbols for "Malefice," "Pestilence," and "Unravelling."{/d} They shimmer forebodingly, like a martyr gasping for air as life drains from them.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La lisa obsidiana de la inmensa losa empieza a distorsionarse. Una serie de símbolos misteriosos aparece en la superficie, como si los trazara un dedo invisible. Los tres más brillantes representan «Maleficio», «Pestilencia» y «Anulación». Emiten un brillo siniestro, como un mártir intentando coger aire mientras muere.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La surface lisse de l'énorme dalle d'obsidienne se met à onduler. Un ensemble de mystérieux symboles apparaît dessus, comme s'ils y avaient été dessinés par un doigt invisible. Les trois glyphes les plus brillants signifient {d|Encyclopedia:Ch5_NecronKnowlege}« maléfice », « pestilence » et « effondrement »{/d}. Leur vacillement funeste fait penser à un martyr en train de suffoquer alors que la vie lui échappe.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The obsidian smoothness of the enormous slab begins to ripple and roil. A set of mysterious symbols appears on it, as if impressed on its black surface by an invisible finger. The three brightest ones are {d|Encyclopedia:Ch5_NecronKnowlege}symbols for "Malefice," "Pestilence," and "Unravelling."{/d} They shimmer forebodingly, like a martyr gasping for air as life drains from them.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La surface lisse de l'énorme dalle d'obsidienne se met à onduler. Un ensemble de mystérieux symboles apparaît dessus, comme s'ils y avaient été dessinés par un doigt invisible. Les trois glyphes les plus brillants signifient « maléfice », « pestilence » et « effondrement ». Leur vacillement funeste fait penser à un martyr en train de suffoquer alors que la vie lui échappe.{/n}

languages.text: {n}黒曜石のように滑らかな巨大な平板が、さざ波立ち乱れ始める。一連の不思議なシンボルが、まるで見えざる手で刻印されたように、黒い表面に現れる。中でもひと際明るく輝いているのは、{d|Encyclopedia:Ch5_NecronKnowlege}”悪行”、”疫病”、”解明”の三つのシンボル{/d}だ。シンボルは、まるで生命を吸われ、空気を求めてあえぐ殉教者のように不吉に揺らめいている。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The obsidian smoothness of the enormous slab begins to ripple and roil. A set of mysterious symbols appears on it, as if impressed on its black surface by an invisible finger. The three brightest ones are {d|Encyclopedia:Ch5_NecronKnowlege}symbols for "Malefice," "Pestilence," and "Unravelling."{/d} They shimmer forebodingly, like a martyr gasping for air as life drains from them.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}黒曜石のように滑らかな巨大な平板が、さざ波立ち乱れ始める。一連の不思議なシンボルが、まるで見えざる手で刻印されたように、黒い表面に現れる。中でもひと際明るく輝いているのは、”悪行”、”疫病”、”解明”の三つのシンボルだ。シンボルは、まるで生命を吸われ、空気を求めてあえぐ殉教者のように不吉に揺らめいている。{/n}

languages.text: {n}巨大金属板黑曜石般的光滑表面泛起了涟漪，一组神秘的符号浮现其上，仿佛是被某个看不见的手指印上去的一般。其中，{d|Encyclopedia:Ch5_NecronKnowlege}三个最明亮的符号分别代表“恶意”、“瘟疫”与“解体”{/d}。这些符号闪烁着预示性的光芒，宛如无数殉道者喘着粗气，静静等待生命消散的时刻。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The obsidian smoothness of the enormous slab begins to ripple and roil. A set of mysterious symbols appears on it, as if impressed on its black surface by an invisible finger. The three brightest ones are {d|Encyclopedia:Ch5_NecronKnowlege}symbols for "Malefice," "Pestilence," and "Unravelling."{/d} They shimmer forebodingly, like a martyr gasping for air as life drains from them.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}巨大金属板黑曜石般的光滑表面泛起了涟漪，一组神秘的符号浮现其上，仿佛是被某个看不见的手指印上去的一般。其中，三个最明亮的符号分别代表“恶意”、“瘟疫”与“解体”。这些符号闪烁着预示性的光芒，宛如无数殉道者喘着粗气，静静等待生命消散的时刻。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der glatte Obsidian der enormen Tafel beginnt sich zu kräuseln, zu brodeln. Eine Reihe mysteriöser Symbole erscheint darauf, wie von einem unsichtbaren Finger auf die schwarze Oberfläche geschrieben. Die drei hellsten sind {d|Encyclopedia:Ch5_NecronKnowlege}Symbole für 'Bosheit', 'Pestilenz' und 'Auftrennung'{/d} . Sie schimmern bedrohlich, wie ein Märtyrer, der nach Luft ringt, während das Leben aus seinem Körper entweicht.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The obsidian smoothness of the enormous slab begins to ripple and roil. A set of mysterious symbols appears on it, as if impressed on its black surface by an invisible finger. The three brightest ones are {d|Encyclopedia:Ch5_NecronKnowlege}symbols for "Malefice," "Pestilence," and "Unravelling."{/d} They shimmer forebodingly, like a martyr gasping for air as life drains from them.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der glatte Obsidian der enormen Tafel beginnt sich zu kräuseln, zu brodeln. Eine Reihe mysteriöser Symbole erscheint darauf, wie von einem unsichtbaren Finger auf die schwarze Oberfläche geschrieben. Die drei hellsten sind Symbole für "Bosheit", "Pestilenz" und "Auftrennung". Sie schimmern bedrohlich, wie ein Märtyrer, der nach Luft ringt, während das Leben aus seinem Körper entweicht.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Devasa tabakanın obsidyen pürüzsüzlüğü dalgalanmaya ve titremeye başlıyor. Üzerinde bir dizi gizemli sembol oluşuyor. Görünmez bir parmak, siyah yüzeyde iz bırakıyor gibi sanki. Bunların en parlak üç tanesi {d|Encyclopedia:Ch5_NecronKnowlege}"Kötücüllük", "Hastalık" ve "Çözülme" sembolleri{/d}. Yaşamını kaybetmek üzere olan bir şehidin nefes almaya çalışması gibi, net bir geleceğe işaret edercesine parlıyorlar.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The obsidian smoothness of the enormous slab begins to ripple and roil. A set of mysterious symbols appears on it, as if impressed on its black surface by an invisible finger. The three brightest ones are {d|Encyclopedia:Ch5_NecronKnowlege}symbols for "Malefice," "Pestilence," and "Unravelling."{/d} They shimmer forebodingly, like a martyr gasping for air as life drains from them.{/n}
